name: Save Me, Sakuya-san!: Remilia Scarlet's Coin and Glass Game
storyline: A light hearted continuation of Save Me, Sakuya-san! With Sakuya gone to resolve an incident, Remilia Scarlet finally decides to pay you a visit with an offer you can't refuse! Beat her in a simple game involving a glass of "wine" and some coins, and she'll change your fate to whatever you see fit. Of course, this is a lot easier said then done!
summary: With Sakuya gone, Remilia Scarlet takes over and pays you a visit with an offer you can't refuse in this precision based visual novel with challenging gameplay and multiple endings! Your fate literally rests on your hands!
